name: Polterguest (tabby, unseconds)
description:
A Helpful Ghost Roommate

Man your roommate is a heavy sleeper, snoozing through their alarm again!! But lucky for them you're a disembodied spirit. Use your poltergeist skills to trash this room until they wake up. 

Controls: CLICK SHIT!

Credits

Music: @unseconds
Design, scripts & assets: @unseconds + @alttabby
Sound effects: Various creators, see read me file.
Originally made in 2020.
